turkish_example_sentence: O yeni bir ev istemese, şimdiki dairede kalabilir.
english_example_sentence: If she were not to want a new house, she could stay in her current apartment.
russian_example_sentence: Если бы она не захотела новый дом, она могла бы остаться в своей нынешней квартире.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: O yeni bir ev ______, şimdiki dairede kalabilir.
